Description: Limestone ostracon containing four prescriptions for medical treatments in case of skin diseases in the area of the head. 10 lines of text on recto and 9 lines on verso.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably from the excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (281-286, pl. 40)
Delattre 2002 / CR de O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II et O.Ashm.Copt. (p.332)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82903) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82903)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 37 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
